title: Social Competency Enhancement Short-Term Course Through MOOC-Based Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Social Issue Analysis and Project-Based Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Course for In-Service Professionals to Deepen Social Domain Expertise and Enhance Collaborative Competencies, Supporting Flexible Learning via Personal Devices and Mobile Environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more social problem-solving strategies through MOOC materials and flipped learning activities

Learners demonstrate over 80% of the four presences (learning, cognitive, social, teaching presence) in the modified Community of Inquiry framework during online discussions and field collaboration activities
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans five or more times within a week using microlearning modules
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
